kill

public void kill()
Description copied from class: Bead
Stops this Bead, and sets its state to deleted if this Bead is self-deleting. Means different things for different subclasses of Bead.

Overrides:
kill in class Bead

calculateBuffer

public void calculateBuffer()
Description copied from class: UGen
Subclassses of UGen should put the UGen's DSP perform routine in here. In general this involves grabbing data from UGen.bufIn and putting data into UGen.bufOut in some way. The length of the buffer is given by UGen.bufferSize.

Specified by:
calculateBuffer in class UGen
